p: To confirm the involvement of voltage operated, and /or receptor operated calcium channels, and the enhancement of calcium release form internal stores in the vasodilator effect of AcEO, two sets of experiments were carried out as described by [56]. First, cumulative doses of the AcEO (0.1–100 μg/ml) were added to aorta precontracted with both K+ (80 mM) and Phen (1 μM). In another set of experiments, a comparative profile of the vasorelaxant effect of ACEO cumulative doses (10−4–10−1 mg/ml) and verapamil (10−8-10−6 M) was challenged on the aorta precontracted by K+ (80 mM).
